docstring.long_description:
length equal to the input Vector length or Scalar.

This block uses the 'linspace' numpy function. It is useful for
generating an x-axis for the OrderedPair data type.

Inputs
------
default : Scalar | Vector
    Length of resulting linspace vector.
docstring.short_description: Generate a Vector of evenly spaced data between two points with a

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start point of the data.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end point of the data.

parameters.name: step
parameters.description: The number of points in the vector.

returns.description: v: the vector between 'start' and 'end' with a 'step' number of points.
